attributes.action: Prosecute the mainstream media outlets for FAKE NEWS
attributes.additional_details:
If a report or post is found to be untrue then the reporting company or site should be prosecuted with large fines and even forced to shut down depending on the severity of the lie.

The questions asked by ‘reporters’ in critical times such as the Covid 19 outbreak are designed to trip up the interviewees and force answers that can be twisted to create FAKE NEWS
People have real concerns and want real answers that maybe wouldn’t give them the headlines they want to push onto the British people.
attributes.background:
The Government needs to create a department to monitor and prosecute reckless reporting that has and still continues to cause fear, hatred and division between the British people.  

All ‘News’ reports by mainstream media outlets via any platform must be proven as 100% correct before being aired.

rejection.details:
Criminalise the publication of unfounded false statements by the media
